// An index to track Ada's memberships
    {
      ""users"": {
        ""alovelace"": {
          ""name"": ""Ada Lovelace"",
          // Index Ada's groups in her profile
          ""groups"": {
             // the value here doesn't matter, just that the key exists
             ""techpioneers"": true,
             ""womentechmakers"": true
          }
        },
        ...
      },
      ""groups"": {
        ""techpioneers"": {
          ""name"": ""Historical Tech Pioneers"",
          ""members"": {
            ""alovelace"": true,
            ""ghopper"": true,
            ""eclarke"": true
          }
        },
        ...
      }
    }
